description.title: Large impacts on Public Sector fiscal measures excluding banking groups (one off events): Appendix B
description.summary: Large events which impact on the current PSNB ex and PSND ex from the period May 2000 onwards. Impacts are shown for the components of public sector net borrowing, net cash requirement and net debt.
description.metaDescription: Large events which impact on the current PSNB ex and PSND ex from the period May 2000 onwards. Impacts are shown for the components of public sector net borrowing, net cash requirement and net debt.
